name: Snakoban - 倉庫蛇
description:
The snake wanted to be a warehouse keeper

Get to the green exit box

WASD or Arrows to move
Z to undo
R to reset


Made with a resolution of 64x64 pixels because of the #LowRezJam https://itch.io/jam/lowrezjam2016

On chrome it should be displayed properly, on others it might look blurry.

Submitted to LD35 as well: http://ludumdare.com/compo/ludum-dare-35/?action=preview&uid=16828

Made on a pretty nice sunday afternoon.
